title: Trump formally renominated on day one of RNC
description: President Trump is now the official Republican nominee for president, after a scaled-back roll call on the first day of the Republican National Convention.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Video shows Wisconsin police shooting Black man in back
description: 29-year-old Jacob Blake was shot in the back multiple times by police in Kenosha, Wisconsin, a bystander's video showed, prompting protests and widespread outrage. Wisconsin’s Department of Justice is investigating, saying the officers are “fully cooperating”…
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Back-to-back storms head for Gulf Coast
description: After knocking out power to more than a million homes in the Carribean, and claiming at least nine lives, states from the panhandle to the parishes of Louisiana and Texas are bracing for impact this week.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: India building collapse traps dozens
description: Dozens of people are trapped in rubble after an apartment building in India collapsed. It is not yet known what caused the five-story building to cave in.
source.name: NBC News

author: Andrea Cavallier
title: Sisters continue to search for brother who was last seen at Virginia gas station in July
description: Zachary Pruitt, 25, of Chatham, Virginia, was last seen at the Kwik Shop gas station in Dry Fork, Virginia, near Chatham, on July 28, 2020. His wallet and cell phone were found at his house. His dark gray 2006 Pontiac G6 with Virginia license plate #4876UT an…
content:
Nearly a month has passed since Zachary Pruitt was last seen or heard from and his family told Dateline they are worried and just want him home safe.
Days turned into weeks and we just cant believe … [+4119 chars]
source.name: NBC News
